CustomField.description: This field is optional and can be collected as part of a workflow. It specifies the type of recharacterization.
CustomField.label: IRA Recharacterization Type

value.fullName: Roth conversion back to Traditional or SIMPLE
value.label: Roth conversion back to Traditional or SIMPLE

value.fullName: Erroneous rollover or transfer from Traditional to SIMPLE and back to Traditional
value.label: Erroneous rollover or transfer from Traditional to SIMPLE and back to Traditional

value.fullName: Roth rollover or direct rollover from an ERP to Traditional
value.label: Roth rollover or direct rollover from an ERP to Traditional

value.fullName: Roth beneficiary direct rollover from an ERP to traditional beneficiary
value.label: Roth beneficiary direct rollover from an ERP to traditional beneficiary
